mil3.4.2:1.7: “Kim pana, bhante, sabbam lonam jivhaya vijanati”ti?
mil3.4.2:2.1: “Yadi, bhante, sabbam lonam jivhaya vijanati, kissa pana tam sakatehi balibadda aharanti, nanu lonameva aharitabban”ti?
mil3.4.2:2.2: “Na sakka, maharaja, lonameva aharitum ekatobhavagata ete dhamma gocarananattagata lonam garubhavo cati.
mil3.4.2:2.3: Sakka pana, maharaja, lonam tulaya tulayitun”ti?
mil3.4.2:2.5: “Na sakka, maharaja, lonam tulaya tulayitum, garubhavo tulaya tuliyati”ti.
